column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////This place used to be my absolute favourite ramen place in Houston. Recently though
column2: I feel like the quality has gone down? Not sure
column3: but the flavors don't pop out at me like they used to and the broth feels too thick sometimes. Still my go to because it's still the best we've got in Houston
column4: but I think unless they up their game someone else will come along and steal the throne. Oh by the way
column5: I'm Japanese so I guess you could say I have a pretty high standard for ramen.
